typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	GeneratedBatchDate as string,
	WorkbookName as string,
	WorksheetName as string,
	MasterPipelineName as string
}
source(output(
		UOM_Name as string,
		UOM_Desc as string,
		UOM_Type as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ReadSource
source(output(
		UOM_ID as integer,
		UOM_Name as string,
		UOM_Desc as string,
		UOM_Type as string,
		UOM_Long_Desc as string,
		Insert_DateTime as timestamp,
		Update_DateTime as timestamp,
		Process_Name as string,
		Source_File as string,
		Batch_ID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT DISTINCT [UOM_ID]\n      ,[UOM_Name]\n      ,[UOM_Desc]\n      ,[UOM_Type]\n      ,[UOM_Long_Desc]\n      ,[Insert_DateTime]\n      ,[Update_DateTime]\n      ,[Process_Name]\n      ,[Source_File]\n      ,[Batch_ID]\n  FROM [datamart].[Dim_UOM]',
	format: 'query') ~> RelationalDimUomLkp
RelationalDimUomLkp select(mapColumn(
		UOM_ID_Lkp = UOM_ID,
		UOM_Name_Lkp = UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type_Lkp = UOM_Type,
		UOM_Long_Desc_Lkp = UOM_Long_Desc,
		Insert_DateTime_Lkp = Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime_Lkp = Update_DateTime,
		Process_Name_Lkp = Process_Name,
		Source_File_Lkp = Source_File,
		Batch_ID_Lkp = Batch_ID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDimUomLkp
ReadSource derive(Source_File = concat($WorkbookName,'-', $WorksheetName),
		Batch_ID = replace(replace(replace($GeneratedBatchDate, "-", ""),":","")," ",""),
		Process_Name = $MasterPipelineName) ~> DataTransformation
RemoveDuplicate, SelectDimUomLkp lookup(UOM_Name == UOM_Name_Lkp,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CheckDimensionRecordExist
GetNewOrModified derive(InsertUpdateFlag = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), "I", "U"),
		Insert_DateTime = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney'), Insert_DateTime_Lkp),
		Update_DateTime = iif(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp), toTimestamp(""), fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')),
		Process_Name = Process_Name,
		Batch_ID = Batch_ID) ~> AddAdditionalAudit
AddAdditionalAudit alterRow(insertIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"I")),
	updateIf(equals(InsertUpdateFlag,"U"))) ~> AlterRowInsertUpdate
DataTransformation split(not(isNull(UOM_Name)),
	disjoint: false) ~> CheckInputRecord@(Valid, Invalid)
RemoveBlankRow derive(Error_Desc = toString("UOM Name/UOM Desc/UOM Type"),
		Insert_Datetime = fromUTC(currentUTC(), 'Australia/Sydney')) ~> AddErrorDetail
CheckInputRecord@Invalid filter(not(isNull(UOM_Name)) || not(isNull(UOM_Desc)) || not(isNull(UOM_Type))) ~> RemoveBlankRow
CheckDimensionRecordExist filter(isNull(UOM_Name_Lkp) || notEquals(UOM_Desc, UOM_Desc_Lkp) || notEquals(UOM_Type, UOM_Type_Lkp)) ~> GetNewOrModified
ReplaceNullToUndefined aggregate(groupBy(UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name)) ~> RemoveDuplicate
CheckInputRecord@Valid derive(UOM_Desc = iifNull(UOM_Desc, "Undefined"),
		UOM_Type = iifNull(UOM_Type, "Undefined")) ~> ReplaceNullToUndefined
AlterRowInsertUpdate sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['Deliver_Point_Code'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type,
		Source_File,
		Batch_ID,
		Process_Name,
		Insert_DateTime,
		Update_DateTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TargetDim
AddErrorDetail sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		UOM_Name,
		UOM_Desc,
		UOM_Type,
		Source_File,
		Process_Name,
		Error_Desc,
		Insert_Datetime
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> ErrorTable
